page.title: 09FENSTANTON SHOPS
page.content: Although it is only a village, { {Fenstanton}is quite a large place. People can buy almost anything they want. There are{quite a lot of shops in {Fenstanton,}including hairdresser's, electrical shop,flower shop,fish and chip shop,post office,butcher's etc. {In the olden days}we think there used to be{six bakeries}but now there is only one.{ { }However some people like to go to {markets}to buy things and{big super {markets}to buy food . They go mainly to{Cambridge, {St.Ives, Barhill and Huntington. { }There are{16 shops in Fenstanton} and other businesses.The{population {of 2500}needs many local shops and many people stop in the village to buy things.
